column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Seriously. These are fresh
column3: delicious pizza pies. We got the butter crust (c'mon
column4: you gotta go all the way when you're visiting Chicago and only have one night to try pizza)! I think our pizza was the equivalent of the "kitchen sink" in some other shops
column5: and I'd get it all over again even though I'm usually a one-topping gal.
